thread.title: China Energy Major Sinopec Suffers Profit Drop on Low Oil Prices
thread.title_full: China Energy Major Sinopec Suffers Profit Drop on Low Oil Prices - WSJ

author: Brian Spegele
title: China Energy Major Sinopec Suffers Profit Drop on Low Oil Prices
text:
BEIJING—China’s Sinopec Corp. said its net profit fell 22% in the first half of the year to 25.39 billion yuan ($3.96 billion) as crude-oil prices slid.
The country’s largest refiner, also known as China Petroleum & Chemical Corp., said Wednesday that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
